description: Gets the information about a specific contract deployed on the blockchain.

parameters.name: contractIdentifier
parameters.description: Contains the blockchain address and network information about the contract. network (string) --- The blockchain network of the contract. contractAddress (string) --- Container for the blockchain address about a contract.

nested_items.name: contractIdentifier
nested_items.description: Contains the blockchain address and network information about the contract.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network of the contract.

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: Container for the blockchain address about a contract.

nested_items.name: tokenStandard
nested_items.description: The token standard of the contract requested.

nested_items.name: deployerAddress
nested_items.description: The address of the deployer of contract.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the token contract.

nested_items.name: symbol
nested_items.description: The symbol of the token contract.

nested_items.name: decimals
nested_items.description: The decimals used by the token contract.
